description: Allows the user to transform into a jacket that can be worn by another person, effectively taking control of their body and combining their strength. The user becomes a 'Jacket Human.'

users.circumstances: Kelly Funk has been shown to possess this fruit, using it during the Block C tournament at Corrida Colosseum.

abilityReveals.description: Kelly transforms into a jacket that his brother Bobby wears, allowing Kelly to control Bobby's much stronger body and combine their abilities.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used during Block C of the Corrida Colosseum tournament, though Sai easily counters the technique.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
User is vulnerable when in jacket form if the wearer is defeated

strengths.strength: Allows the user to control a stronger person's body
strengths.description: Kelly, who is small and weak, can control his much larger and stronger brother Bobby by wearing him like a jacket.

strengths.strength: Combines the abilities and strength of two people
strengths.description: The jacket form allows both Kelly's cunning and Bobby's strength to work together.
